sentences.en: A transistor memory cell can be made with any number of terminals.
sentences.cn: 晶体管存贮单元端点的数量是不受限制的.

sentences.en: A tube or a transistor can amplify an incoming signal.
sentences.cn: 电子管和晶体管能放大输入的信号.

sentences.en: Every transistor has at least three electrodes.
sentences.cn: 每个晶体管至少有三个电极.

sentences.en: Have you a transistor radio in your home?
sentences.cn: 你家有晶体管收音机 吗 ?

sentences.en: He devised a new type of transistor.
sentences.cn: 他发明了一种新的晶体管。

sentences.en: He works in the transistor factory near our school.
sentences.cn: 他在我们学校附近的晶体管收音机厂工作.

sentences.en: Hundreds of people huddled around a single transistor radio listening to the announcement.
sentences.cn: 数百人挤在一台晶体管收音机周围收听公告。

sentences.en: I have traded my old radio in for a transistor.
sentences.cn: 我把那台旧收音机折价换了一台半导体收音机.

sentences.en: She took her transistor everywhere with her.
sentences.cn: 她去哪里都带着晶体管收音机.

sentences.en: The concepts described above are embodied in the junction transistor.
sentences.cn: 上述各种概念都反映在结型晶体管中.

sentences.en: The modern successor to the transistor is the integrated circuit.
sentences.cn: 晶体管的现代后继者是集成电路.

sentences.en: The old man always carries about a transistor.
sentences.cn: 这位老人总是随身携带一台晶体管收音机。

sentences.en: The positive - going signal subtracts from the forward bias of the lower transistor.
sentences.cn: 正向信号则使它的正向偏压减弱.

sentences.en: The transistor became the basis of a new invention called the "computer" which I suspect those of you reading this may be familiar with.
sentences.cn: 晶体管后来成为了一项叫做“计算机”的新发明的基础，我想正在阅读本文的你对于这个应该比较熟悉吧。

sentences.en: This is done in the analog realm by wiring a transistor in a certain way.
sentences.cn: 在模拟世界里，这是通过以某种方式连接的晶体管来做到的。

sentences.en: This make of transistor radio is small and beautifully designed.
sentences.cn: 这半导体收音机小巧玲珑.

sentences.en: This transistor radio has four small cells.
sentences.cn: 这台半导体收音机用4节小电池.

sentences.en: We are using this transistor to amplify a telephone signal.
sentences.cn: 我们正在使用这种晶体管来放大电话信号.

sentences.en: When you got a transistor radio, you could walk around with it, and today you can put your whole record collection in your pocket.
sentences.cn: 而当你使用晶体管收音机时，你可以带着它到处走动，时至今日你可以把你收集的唱片装进口袋里。

words.tran_cn: 晶体管化的；装有晶体管的

phrases.tran_cn: 面结型晶体管；结式晶体管

trans.tran_cn: 晶体管，晶体管收音机，半导体收音机
trans.tran_en: a small piece of electronic equipment in radios, televisions etc that controls the flow of electricity
